snippet: Nigerian officials arrested four Mexicans who were accused of creating a lab capable of producing billions of dollars’ worth of methamphetamine.
abstract: Nigerian officials arrest four Mexicans who were accused of helping to build so-called superlab capable of producing 8,800 pounds of methamphetamine weekly.
lead_paragraph: Nigerian officials arrested four Mexicans who were accused of creating a lab capable of producing billions of dollars’ worth of methamphetamine.

headline.main: Nigeria: Huge Methamphetamine Lab Built With Mexican Help, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Africa; Nigeria: Huge Methamphetamine Lab Built With Mexican Help, Officials Say
